ComicInfo.Series: Jim Henson's Fraggle Rock: Journey to the Everspring
ComicInfo.Summary:
After meeting the never-before-seen Doozer colony of Crystal Cave, the Fraggles may need a little more help to unclog the Everspring and bring water back to Fraggle Rock than they realized. But will Gobo and the gang be able to unite the two Doozer colonies and get the job done before itâ€™s too late?
